You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iota;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Iota;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0399/index.htm U+00399].
  * `&iota;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b9/index.htm U+003B9].
